action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Rome
TO: Athens
BY: Boat
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: In ten days

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes
yes
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Have you informed the travel agent about your destination? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you believe that the travel agent is aware of how you are going to travel? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for BY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the travel agent knows in which class the trip will happen? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for CLASS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the travel agent already know your preferred dates? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for WHEN valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
Where do you want to go?
TRAVEL-AGENT: Where do you want to go?
ANSWER: I want to go from Rome to Athens.
I want to go from Rome to Athens.
Slot filled: True
Value for FROM anticipated; ground truth turn updated from 3 to 0.
I want to go from Rome to Athens.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the travel agent where you are leaving from? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I have told the travel agent that I am leaving from Rome.
yes
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the travel agent where you want to go to? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I have told the travel agent that I want to go from Rome to Athens.
yes
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you already mentioned the means of transportation of your trip to the travel agent? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I have mentioned that I want to travel by boat.
yes
Answer for BY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Have you informed the travel agent about your class preference? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not informed the travel agent about my class preference.
no
Answer for CLASS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the travel agent when are you travelling, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for WHEN valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What is the date of departure?
TRAVEL-AGENT: What is the date of departure?
ASIDE: The date of departure is in ten days from now.
NA
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.
Game finished.

probes.question: ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Please answer yes or no.
ME: Have you informed the travel agent about your destination? Please answer yes or no.
ME: Do you believe that the travel agent is aware of how you are going to travel? Please answer yes or no.
ME: Do you think the travel agent knows in which class the trip will happen? Please answer yes or no.
ME: Does the travel agent already know your preferred dates? Please answer yes or no.
ME: Have you told the travel agent where you are leaving from? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: Yes, I have told the travel agent that I am leaving from Rome.

probes.answer: ASIDE: Yes, I have told the travel agent that I want to go from Rome to Athens.

probes.answer: ASIDE: Yes, I have mentioned that I want to travel by boat.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the travel agent about your class preference? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, I have not informed the travel agent about my class preference.
